lang.title: Title
lang.insecureCONNDBDIR: The connection database location that you have specified is under the webserver's document root. This may expose OAT to security risks. Click OK if you still wish to continue.
lang.import: Import connection information from an XML file
lang.export: Export connection information to an XML file
lang.importcheckbox: Remove all existing connection information before importing the XML file.
lang.exportcheckbox: Include sensitive password information in the exported XML file.
lang.overwriteConfirm: All currently existing connection information will be deleted. Are you sure?
lang.securityWarning: The exported XML file contains sensitive password information, such as the informix password. Make sure this file is saved at a secure location.
lang.LANG: The default language for the OAT pages.
lang.CONNDBDIR: The directory for the OAT connections database. Specify a secure directory that is not under the document directory for the web server.
lang.BASEURL: The URL where OAT is installed in this format: http://servername:port/location.
lang.HOMEDIR: The directory for the OAT installation.
lang.ROWSPERPAGE: The default number of rows per page to display when data is shown in a table format.
lang.PINGINTERVAL: The length of time (in seconds) between updates of the server status. The server status is shown on the Health Center > Dashboard > Group Summary page.
lang.HOMEPAGE: The page to use as the OAT home page.
lang.SECURESQL: Require login credentials for the SQL ToolBox.
lang.SECURESQL_tooltip: Password protect the Schema Browser, SQL Editor, and Query by Example pages. Users can view or change table data on these pages.
lang.INFORMIXCONTIME: The length of time (in seconds) that OAT attempts to connect to the database server before returning an error (INFORMIXCONTIME).
lang.INFORMIXCONRETRY: The number of times that OAT attempts to connect to the database server during the Informix connect time (INFORMIXCONRETRY).
lang.SaveCfgFailure: Saving config failed because file is not writable:
lang.AddNewConnFailWithError: Adding a new connection failed with error code:
lang.AddNewConnIDSDFailWithError: Adding a new connection to idsd failed with error code:
lang.InsertCEnvVarsFailedWithError: Insert into conn_envvars failed with error code:
lang.UpdConnFailedWithError: Updating connection failed with error code:
lang.ReplaceIDSDFailedWithError: Replacing idsd failed with error code:
lang.DeleteCEnvVarsFailedWithError: Delete from conn_envvars failed with error code:
lang.UpdCEnvVarsFailedWithError: Update: insert into conn_envvars failed with error code:
lang.ErrorOccurredGroupNumRequired: An error occured - group number is required
lang.EditGroupFailedWithError: Editing group failed with error code:
lang.AddGroupFailedWithError: Adding a new group failed with error code:
lang.ErrorDeletingConn: Error: function dodelconn called with wrong arguments
lang.DeleteConnFailedWithError: Deleting connection(s) failed with error code:
lang.DeleteGroupsFailedWithError: Deleting group(s) failed with error code:
lang.ErrorOpeningHelpDB: There was an error opening the help database
lang.SureToDeleteConn: Are you sure you want to delete these connections?
lang.SureToDeleteGroup: Are you sure you want to delete? Deleting a group will also delete any connections defined for that group!
lang.AskDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?
lang.InvalidEnvVar: Error: You must specify both the environment variable name and value.
